casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Kelvin Allen McNEIL. No. 508P10-1. Supreme Court of North Carolina. Feb. 3, 2011. David B. Efird, Assistant Attorney General, for State of North Carolina. Kelvin Allen McNeil, Brunswick, for McNeil, Kelvin Allen. Rex Gore, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

Opinion

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 3rd of December 2010 by Defendant to Proceed In Forma Pauperis:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 3rd of February 2011."
